ðŸ“– Summary: Whatsmeow is a Go library that provides comprehensive access to the WhatsApp web multidevice API. It allows Go developers to send and receive messages, manage groups, handle various event types, and manage app state, making it easier to integrate WhatsApp functionality into Go applications.
